Action.author: jonathan-blood
Action.body: ~denyeart ~chris.elder I think I messed something up and so the change didn't get hooked up with this issue correctly, but I have an outstanding commit to resolve this: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/26412/ - not 100% sure why there is builds failing on that though, given it's some minor docker-compose configuration changes only.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Thanks ~jonathan-blood , I've just rebased the CR to see if that fixes the verification failure.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Might as well cherry pick to release-1.1 as well: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/26639/
